title: A surface-to-bulk tunning deep delithiation strategy towards 5C fast-charging 4.6 V LiCoO2
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01674B, Paper
Zhihong Bi, Zonglin Yi, Anping Zhang, Cong Dong, gongrui Wang, Lijing Xie, shihao Liao, Hanqing Liu, Cheng-Meng Chen, Zhong-Shuai Wu
Achieving highly reversible anionic redox reactions (ARR) in high-voltage LiCoO2 (LCO) is critical for increasing power/energy density but still lacks a reliable tuning strategy. Herein, we report a comprehensive surface-to-bulk...
